title: [2/15 Headers] Waiting for Consensus Layer...
body:
Hello together, 

somehow  my erigon node got stuck at 2/15 headers as it seems. I'm running the 2.43 version and the console output is attached below, any idea why that is?

@Theworldzyours are you using any external consensus layer? check this out - https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/releases/tag/v2.43.0#:~:text=Added%20first%20phase%20of%20Caplin%20(embeddable%20Consensus%20Layer%20implementation)%2C%20replaces%20embedded%20CL%20light%20client.%20Disabled%20by%20default%2C%20enabled%20by%20%2D%2Dinternalcl%20command%20line%20flag.

Hey thanks for getting back! I'm using lighthouse at the moment as CL client. Before with 2.42 i was using the lightclient, which did perform satisfactory given my requirements. Lighthouse seems to be working fine for me though, please see the logs below. You think I should give Caplin a shot?

hi @Theworldzyours your erigon logs look fine to me, the payload height is increasing block by block...
Hey @keithchew, thanks a lot! Just thought there might be some issue with the headers updating, but i did all kinds of tests in the meantime and everything seems to be working just fine.
